sources.title: 34th Express
sources.description:
Fast train №34 "Moscow-Elekmonar" departed exactly on schedule. The passengers were calmly preparing for bed when the curtain in the empty compartment of the conductor on duty caught fire from an unextinguished cigarette. Soon the carriage also caught fire...

Year of production: 1982

Director: Malyukov Andrey
Writers: Malyukov Andrey, Ivanov Vsevolod
Composer: Minkov Mark
Operator: Gantman Yuri
Production designer: Tatyana Lapshina

Cast: Elena Mayorova, Lev Durov, Masiulis Algimantas, Alexander Fatyushin, Alexander Ryshchenkov, Gaudiņš Peteris, Oleg Golubitsky, Vyacheslav Ezepov, Irina Pechernikova, Valery Ryzhakov, Marina Shimanskaya
